column4: checks whether the user has set their prefered language
this is set when an account has been created on the API
this is set when there's an error from the API during account creation
this is set when an account does not have a status of SUCCESS
this is set when an account has a status of SUCCESS
this is set when the confirmation PIN matches the initial PIN during registration
this is set when a newly registered user sets a PIN. This must be present for an account to access the main menu
this is set to allow a user access guarded nodes after providing a correct PIN
this is set when the transaction recipient is invalid
this is set when the transaction recipient is valid but not on the platform
this is set when the given transaction amount is invalid
this is set when the provided PIN is invalid or does not match the current account's PIN
this is set when the given PIN is valid
this is set to allow a user to update their profile data
this is set to allow a user to edit a single profile item such as year of birth
this is set when the given year of birth is invalid
this is set when the selected voucher is invalid
this is set when communication to an external service fails
this is set when a user does not have an active voucher
this is set when a user has admin privileges.
this is set when an unregistered phonenumber tries to perform an action
